extraction.title: OwnTracks 0.4.21 fresh install from PlayStore
extraction.description: in prefs/Connection I see "Error: java.lang.illegalArgumentException" (before configuring connection parameters).Other than that, everything looks very good! Congrats!
extraction.comments: Ah well, that now shows errors reported by the mqtt client such as bad username and password or SSL missmatch things instead of a plain "Error". The problem is when you don't have anything configured it still tries to connect with invalid parameters, hence the illegal argument exception, so it's just cosmetics. I'll fix this in a later version when I add a setup wizzard or sth. alike.
